Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-BOUND Red Line Trains bypassing Chicago Station
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Chicago Station due to police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Chicago Station due to police investigation.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
